statements: UPDATE course_materials SET videos = 'Updated Video Content' WHERE course_id = 123;
UPDATE course_materials SET quizzes = 'New Quiz Questions', lecture_slides = E'\x5468697320697320616e206578616d706c65' WHERE course_id = 456;
UPDATE course_materials SET lecture_slides = E'\xDEADBEEF' WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE course_materials SET videos = E'\xABCD1234' , quizzes = E'\x5678FFAA' WHERE course_id = 202;
UPDATE lecture_materials SET title = 'Updated Lecture Title' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE quiz_materials SET questions = '{"question": "Updated Question"}' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE lecture_materials SET slides_url='http://newslides.com', video_url='http://newvideo.com' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE quiz_materials SET questions='{"1": "What is the capital of France?", "2": "Who wrote Romeo and Juliet?"}' WHERE course_id=2;
UPDATE LectureSlides SET title='Updated Title', content='Updated Content' WHERE lecture_id=1;
UPDATE Videos SET url='https://example.com/new-url', title='New Video Title' WHERE video_id=10;
UPDATE LectureSlides SET content = 'New content for Lecture 1' WHERE lecture_id = 1;
UPDATE Videos SET url = 'https://newurl.com/video123' WHERE video_id = 3;
UPDATE lecture_slides SET slide_number = 5 WHERE slide_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE videos SET video_duration = 120 WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE lecture_slides SET slide_number = 10, slide_file = 'new_image.png' WHERE slide_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE videos SET video_duration = 120, video_file = 'new_video.mp4' WHERE video_id = 'dc592f0a-55a4-4688-b068-bcae22a05414';
UPDATE LectureSlides SET slide_title = 'Updated Slide Title' WHERE slide_id = 1;
UPDATE Videos SET video_title = 'Introduction Video' WHERE video_id = 2;
UPDATE LectureSlides SET slide_title = 'Updated Lecture Title', slide_content = E'\x5468697320697320746865206e6577206c65637475726520636f6e74656e742e' WHERE slide_id = 1;
UPDATE Quizzes SET quiz_questions = '{"question1": "What is the capital of France?", "question2": "Who painted the Mona Lisa?"}' WHERE quiz_id = 3;
